Style/MagicCommentFormat.description:
Description

Use a consistent style for magic comments.
Style/MagicCommentFormat.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: snake_case (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['snake_case', 'kebab_case'] (type: list)
DirectiveCapitalization: lowercase (type: str)
ValueCapitalization: None (type: NoneType)
SupportedCapitalizations: ['lowercase', 'uppercase'] (type: list)
